thought: Slack message sending failed because the Slack API requires the message text to be provided in the 'text' parameter, but 'messages' is missing. I need to set the Slack action parameters correctly with the text field for each message.
plan: Set Slack action params: select channel, channelId as 'general', messageType as 'text'
Ensure the 'text' field is sent in each input item (already done)
criticism: Slack message sending failed due to missing or incorrect parameters for message text; the current params are empty and must be corrected.
